net.openhft.chronicle.engine.api.pubsub

Interface TopicSubscriber<T,M>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISubscriber
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VanillaSubAsset
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface TopicSubscriber<T,M>
extends ISubscriber
    Subscriber for a pair of topic and message on an Asset group.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMessage(T topic, M message)
      Called when a topic in a group has an new message/event

        onEndOfSubscription

    • Method Detail

      • onMessage

        void onMessage(T topic,
               M message)
        throws InvalidSubscriberException
        Called when a topic in a group has an new message/event
        Parameters:
        topic - the message was associated with
        message - published
        Throws:
        InvalidSubscriberException - to throw when this subscriber is no longer valid.
